mapper.sql: account_id, account_name, account_money, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, state, user_id
mapper.insert: insert into t_user_accounts(account_id, account_name, account_money, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, state, user_id) values (#{accountId}, #{accountName}, #{accountMoney}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{updateTime}, #{updateBy}, #{state}, #{userId})
mapper.update: update t_user_accounts set account_name = #{accountName}, account_money = #{accountMoney}, create_time = #{createTime}, create_by = #{createBy}, update_time = #{updateTime}, update_by = #{updateBy}, state = #{state}, user_id = #{userId} where account_id = #{accountId}
